options.name: Business Connections
options.description: For better or worse, you seem to know someone from everywhere. Gain +1 Negotiation. Additionally, when entering a new system with a settlement such as a city or station, you have a connection with a humanoid that owes you a favor.

options.name: Reaction : Roll Out
options.description: In response to being the target of an attack that requires an Evasion or Deflect Check, you gain a 1d4 bonus to the check and roll to an adjacent tile without provoking Reactions.

options.name: Free Action : Cheap Shot
options.description: You make a Melee Attack that deals no damage but causes your opponent to become dazed if they fail a contested Resilience Check unless they are a Humanoid, in which case they become Stunned. An entity can only be targeted once by this ability per combat.

options.name: Roguish Charm
options.description: Somehow, you are both charming and slimey at the same time. Gain +1 Stealth and +1 Presence.

options.name: Professional Gambler
options.description: Your skill with games of chance has given you a lot of experience with trying to pick up on the tells of your opposition while masking your own thoughts. Gain +1 Behavior and +1 Mental Mitigation.

options.name: Action : Improvise
options.description: You improvise, by either using your wit or a physical object to distract your opponents. Until the start of your next turn, gain a 1d4 bonus to all attack and defense checks.

options.name: Alert
options.description: The nature of your business has made you cautious, never letting your guard down and always ready to avoid the next blow. Gain +1 Evasion and +1 Senses.

options.name: Hidden Blaster
options.description: Gain +1 Ranged Weapons. Additionally, you can hide a small Ranged Weapon on your person that cannot be discovered by detection. The first time you use this weapon during combat, gain a 1d4 bonus to both the damage and attack rolls.

options.name: Hot Shot Pilot
options.description: Your line of expertise has given you invaluable experience with starships and their weaponry. Gain +1 Weapon Systems and +1 Coordination.

options.name: Catch Phrases
options.description: You have three different catch phrases for the following events: Making an attack to finish off an opponent, predicting danger to yourself within the next minute, and encouraging an ally with a skill check. Once per day, you can use one of these to grant a 1d8 bonus on a related roll.
